content: TITLE: Basic Usage of NuxtImg Component in Vue DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic usage of the component as a drop-in replacement for the native tag. It shows how to use the component with a local image source. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Automatic Installation of Nuxt Image Module DESCRIPTION: Command to automatically add the @nuxt/image module to a Nuxt project using nuxi CLI. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx nuxi@latest module add image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Image Presets in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to define image presets in the Nuxt configuration file for use with the 'preset' prop in . SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { presets: { cover: { modifiers: { fit: 'cover', format: 'jpg', width: 300, height: 300 } } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Responsive Sizes for NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'sizes' prop to specify responsive sizes for the image. This example demonstrates setting different sizes for various screen breakpoints. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Default Image Quality DESCRIPTION: Configuration to set the default quality for generated images. This can be overridden at the component level using the quality prop. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { quality: 80 } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Nuxt Image Module in nuxt.config.ts DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration structure for the Nuxt Image module in the Nuxt configuration file. This defines the entry point for all image module options. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { // Options } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Rendering with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Illustrates how to use the 'custom' prop with for custom rendering scenarios. It shows how to implement a placeholder while the image is loading and display the actual image once loaded. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtPicture with Multiple Image Formats DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the component with multiple image formats. This configuration generates images in avif, webp, and png formats automatically. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/2.nuxt-picture.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Nuxt Image Module to nuxt.config.ts DESCRIPTION: Configuration code to register the @nuxt/image module in the Nuxt project's configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ modules: [ '@nuxt/image' ] }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Image Densities with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the 'densities' prop to generate versions of the image for screens with different pixel densities. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Placeholders with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Shows various ways to use the 'placeholder' prop with , including automatic generation and custom placeholder images. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Custom HTML Attributes on NuxtPicture's img Element DESCRIPTION: Example demonstrating how to set additional HTML attributes on the underlying img element using the imgAttrs prop. This allows customization of id, class, style, and data attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/2.nuxt-picture.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Responsive Image Implementation with Vuetify and useImage() in Vue DESCRIPTION: Complete example showing how to implement responsive images with Vuetify's v-img component, utilizing useImage() and getSizes to generate proper srcset and sizes attributes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/3.use-image.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Screen Size Breakpoints DESCRIPTION: Configuration to define predefined screen sizes for responsive images. These sizes are used to generate optimized versions of images for different screen sizes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { // The screen sizes predefined by `@nuxt/image`: screens: { xs: 320, sm: 640, md: 768, lg: 1024, xl: 1280, xxl: 1536, '2xl': 1536 } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating URL Aliases for Image Sources DESCRIPTION: Configuration to create aliases for image source URLs. This is particularly useful for shortening external URLs and optimizing HTML output. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { domains: [ 'images.unsplash.com' ], alias: { unsplash: 'https://images.unsplash.com' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Allowing External Domain Optimization DESCRIPTION: Configuration to specify which external domains are allowed to have their images optimized. This prevents abuse of external URLs and ensures only trusted domains are processed. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { domains: ['nuxtjs.org'] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Cloudinary Provider for NuxtImg in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Shows how to configure the Cloudinary provider in the Nuxt configuration file for use with . SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudinary: { baseURL: 'https://res.cloudinary.com/nuxt/image/upload' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic useImage() Composable Usage in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates the basic syntax for the useImage() composable which returns a function that can transform image sources with specified modifiers and options. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/3.use-image.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` const img = useImage() img(src, modifiers, options) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Image Presets in Configuration DESCRIPTION: Configuration to define image presets with pre-defined modifiers. Presets help unify image styling across a project and can be referenced in NuxtImg components. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { presets: { avatar: { modifiers: { format: 'jpg', width: 50, height: 50 } } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Default Image Format DESCRIPTION: Configuration to set the default format for images used by . Available formats include webp, avif, jpeg, jpg, png, and gif. The first supported format in the list will be used. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { format: ['webp'] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using the getSizes Method from useImage() in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Shows the syntax for the getSizes method which is used to generate responsive image sizes based on breakpoints and modifiers. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/3.use-image.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` const img = useImage() img.getSizes(src, { sizes, modifiers }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying CSS to Loaded Images DESCRIPTION: Shows a CSS technique to apply styles only to the loaded image, excluding the placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` img:not(.my-placeholder-class) { /* styles here */ } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Creating Custom Image Providers DESCRIPTION: Configuration to define custom image providers. Each provider can have its own implementation and options. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { providers: { random: { provider: '~/providers/random', options: {} } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Device Pixel Ratio Support DESCRIPTION: Configuration to specify which device pixel ratio values to support for high-resolution displays (like retina). This affects image quality on different devices. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { densities: [1, 2, 3] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Custom Image Provider in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Creates a custom image provider that generates optimized image URLs. Handles source paths and modifiers to construct CDN URLs with optional baseURL configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/4.advanced/1.custom-provider.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { joinURL } from 'ufo' import { createOperationsGenerator, defineProvider } from '#image' const operationsGenerator = createOperationsGenerator() export default defineProvider<{ baseURL?: string }>({ getImage (src, { modifiers, baseURL }) => { if (!baseURL) { // also support runtime config baseURL = useRuntimeConfig().public.siteUrl } const operations = operationsGenerator(modifiers) return { url: joinURL(baseURL, src + (operations ? '?' + operations : '')) } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Default Image Provider DESCRIPTION: Configuration to set the default image provider for the project. This provider will be used when not specified at the component level. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { provider: 'twicpics', twicpics: { baseURL: 'https://nuxt-demo.twic.pics' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changing Source Images Directory DESCRIPTION: Configuration to change the directory where source images are located. This is useful for organizing images in a custom location rather than the default public directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { dir: 'assets/images' } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Custom Provider in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Nuxt configuration setup for registering the custom image provider with its options and path configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/4.advanced/1.custom-provider.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { providers: { myProvider: { name: 'myProvider', // optional value to overrider provider name provider: '~/providers/my-provider.ts', // Path to custom provider options: { // ... provider options baseURL: 'https://site.com' } } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using useImage() for Background Image Styles in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to generate an optimized image URL with width modifier and apply it as a background image using computed styles. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/3.use-image.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: js CODE: ``` const img = useImage() const backgroundStyles = computed(() => { const imgUrl = img('https://github.com/nuxt.png', { width: 100 }) return { backgroundImage: `url('${imgUrl}')` } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Lazy Loading with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the 'loading' attribute with NuxtImg to defer image loading until it appears in the viewport. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Custom Provider in Vue Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using a custom image provider in a Vue component. This references the provider defined in the Nuxt configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Remote Image Domains with Environment Variable in Nuxt Image DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to configure allowed domains for remote images in Nuxt Image using the NUXT_IMAGE_DOMAINS environment variable. Multiple domains can be specified as a comma-separated list. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/3.providers.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` NUXT_IMAGE_DOMAINS="example.com,yourdomain.com" ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Cloudflare Provider with NuxtImg Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using the NuxtImg component with Cloudflare provider to display and transform an image. Demonstrates setting height and fit modifiers. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudflare.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Content Security Policy Nonce with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Shows how to use the 'nonce' attribute with NuxtImg for Content Security Policy. It includes a script setup to retrieve the nonce value. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Cloudinary Base URL in Nuxt DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration to set up Cloudinary provider in Nuxt Image module by specifying the project's base URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudinary: { baseURL: 'https://res.cloudinary.com//image/upload' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Generating Placeholder with useImage in Vue DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the useImage composable to generate a placeholder image based on the original image, useful for SVG sources or when more control over modifiers is needed. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Nuxt Image Module in nuxt.config.ts DESCRIPTION: Example of how to add an image configuration section in the Nuxt configuration file for customizing the module's behavior. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { // Options } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Handling Native Events with NuxtImg in Vue DESCRIPTION: Illustrates how to listen to native events emitted by the element within NuxtImg, specifically the 'onLoad' event. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/2.usage/1.nuxt-img.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Up Nuxt Image Development Environment with Corepack and PNPM DESCRIPTION: Command sequence for setting up the Nuxt Image development environment. This includes cloning the repository, enabling Corepack, installing dependencies, and generating type stubs. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` corepack enable pnpm install pnpm dev:prepare ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Image Presets in Vue Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using a predefined image preset in a Vue component. This references the preset defined in the Nuxt configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Domain Whitelist for Vercel Image Optimization DESCRIPTION: Configuration snippet showing how to whitelist external domains for image optimization using Vercel's Edge Network. This is required when using images from external URLs not in the public directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/vercel.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { domains: ['avatars0.githubusercontent.com'] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Custom Screen Sizes in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Example of configuring custom screen sizes for responsive images in Nuxt config file. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/aws-amplify.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { screens: { icon: 40, avatar: 24 } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Cloudinary Upload DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with Cloudinary provider to display an uploaded image. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Image Prerendering in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Configuration code showing how to set up image prerendering routes when SSR is disabled. This allows Nuxt to pre-generate optimized images during the build process by specifying exact image paths and dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/4.advanced/2.static-images.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ ssr: false, nitro: { prerender: { routes: [ '/_ipx/w_120/market.jpg', '/_ipx/w_140/market.jpg', // etc. ] } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing Responsive Image Component with Size Constraints DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with specific dimensions and the corresponding Nuxt configuration for screen sizes. Shows how to properly define image widths that Vercel requires for optimization. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/vercel.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { screens: { icon: 40, icon2x: 80 } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Default Cover Fit DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider to display an image cropped to 300x300 while preserving the aspect ratio using the default cover fit. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Global $img Helper with inject Option DESCRIPTION: Configuration to globally initialize an $img helper that will be available throughout the application. By default, Nuxt Image v1 uses a composable approach. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { inject: true } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Cloudinary Fetch DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with Cloudinary provider to fetch and display a remote image. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring ImageKit Provider in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Configuration snippet for setting up ImageKit with the Nuxt Image module. The configuration requires specifying your ImageKit URL-endpoint as the baseURL. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imagekit.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { imagekit: { baseURL: 'https://ik.imagekit.io/your_imagekit_id' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Resize Fit DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider to resize an image to 300x300 with distortion using the resize fit property. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Imgix with NuxtImg Component and Advanced Modifiers DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with Imgix provider, demonstrating advanced features like auto format, compression, and intelligent face cropping for optimal image delivery. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imgix.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloudinary Image with Gravity DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Cloudinary's gravity modifier for content-aware cropping. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Contain Fit DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider to fit an image into a 300x600 area while respecting the original 1:1 ratio using letterboxing with the contain fit property. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Hygraph Image with NuxtImg Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with Hygraph provider, demonstrating various image modifiers like height, width, fit, format, and quality settings. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/hygraph.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Imgix Provider in Nuxt Image Module DESCRIPTION: Configuration setup for integrating Imgix with Nuxt Image module. Specifies the base URL of your Imgix service in the Nuxt configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imgix.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { imgix: { baseURL: 'https://assets.imgix.net' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Cloudinary Fetch URL DESCRIPTION: Configuration for handling remote images using Cloudinary's fetch functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudinary: { baseURL: 'https://res.cloudinary.com//image/fetch' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Cloudinary Upload URL DESCRIPTION: Configuration for handling uploaded images using Cloudinary's upload functionality with mapping folder. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudinary: { baseURL: 'https://res.cloudinary.com//image/upload/' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing Dependencies in Nuxt 3 with Package Managers DESCRIPTION: Commands to install project dependencies using npm, pnpm, or yarn package managers. This is the first step after cloning a Nuxt 3 project. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # npm npm install # pnpm pnpm install # yarn yarn install ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg Component with Storyblok Provider (Vue) DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates various ways to use the NuxtImg component with the Storyblok provider, including original image, resized static image, and proportional resizing based on width or height. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/storyblok.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloudinary Image with Round Corners DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Cloudinary's roundCorner modifier for rounded corners effect. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Image Aspect Ratio with TwicPics in Nuxt Image DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to display images with specific aspect ratios using the cover modifier. These examples show a 300px wide image being displayed in a 4:3 aspect ratio, with options for automatic focus detection. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_17 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Fit-in with Background Using NuxtImg Component (Vue) DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to use the fit-in feature with a specific background color using the NuxtImg component and Storyblok provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/storyblok.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Uploadcare Images with NuxtImg Component in Vue DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the NuxtImg component with Uploadcare as the provider. The src attribute requires the UUID of the image from the Uploadcare dashboard. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/uploadcare.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Cloudinary Image with Effect DESCRIPTION: Example of applying a grayscale effect using Cloudinary's effect modifier. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudinary.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Focus Modifier DESCRIPTION: Examples of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider and focus modifier in different scenarios: with auto focus and crop, with auto focus and cover, and with manual focus point and cover. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adjusting Image Quality with NuxtImg Component (Vue) DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to adjust the image quality using the NuxtImg component with the Storyblok provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/storyblok.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enabling Facial Detection with NuxtImg Component (Vue) DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to enable smart cropping using facial detection with the NuxtImg component and Storyblok provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/storyblok.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Image Modifiers with NuxtImg Component DESCRIPTION: Vue component example demonstrating how to use image modifiers and quality settings with the NuxtImg component. Specifies the base URL for the Cloudflare zone where images will be served from. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudflare.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudflare: { baseURL: 'https://that-test.site' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Remote Domains for Netlify Image Provider DESCRIPTION: Configuration to allow transformation of images from specific external domains using Netlify provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/netlify.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { provider: 'netlify', domains: ['images.example.com'] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring ImageEngine Provider in Nuxt DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration for the ImageEngine provider in Nuxt Image module. The minimum requirement is setting the baseURL to your ImageEngine Delivery Address in the Nuxt configuration file. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imageengine.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { imageengine: { baseURL: 'https://xxxxx.imgeng.in' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Contentful Provider in Nuxt Image DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration snippet for enabling Contentful integration with Nuxt Image module. This configuration is added to the nuxt.config.ts file, specifying an empty contentful object to enable the provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/contentful.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { contentful: {} } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Glide Provider in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Configuration code for setting up Glide image processing provider in Nuxt application. Requires specifying the baseURL of the Glide service in the image module configuration. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/glide.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { glide: { // baseURL of your Laravel application baseURL: 'https://glide.herokuapp.com/1.0' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using ImageEngine Crop Modifier with NuxtImg DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to crop an image using ImageEngine's crop directive. The image is cropped to 100x80 pixels, starting from coordinates 10px from top and 20px from left. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imageengine.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Contain Fit and Background Color DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider to fit an image with contain fit and specifying a red background color for the letterboxing areas. It specifies the base URL for the Fastly service. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/fastly.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { fastly: { baseURL: 'https://www.fastly.io' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Directus Provider in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Basic configuration example for setting up Directus as an image provider in Nuxt. Specifies the base URL pointing to the Directus assets directory. The rotate parameter accepts values like 0, 90, 180, 270, 360, or auto. It demonstrates setting the required projectId and optional dataset. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/sanity.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { sanity: { projectId: 'yourprojectid', // Defaults to 'production' // dataset: 'development' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Overriding Default Directus Provider Options DESCRIPTION: Advanced configuration for the Directus provider that includes custom modifiers and transforms. Shows how to set withoutEnlargement option and apply blur and negate transforms. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/directus.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { directus: { baseURL: 'http://mydirectus-domain.com/assets', modifiers: { withoutEnlargement: 'true', transforms: [['blur', 4], ['negate']] } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying Blur Effect with ImageKit DESCRIPTION: Usage example showing how to implement blur effect on an image using ImageKit provider. The blur parameter accepts values from 1 to 100. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying Image Sharpening Effect DESCRIPTION: Example of using the sharpen modifier to enhance image sharpness SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/sirv.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Default Provider Modifiers DESCRIPTION: Configuration to set default modifiers for a specific provider. These modifiers will be applied to all images using this provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/2.configuration.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { provider: 'cloudinary', cloudinary: { baseURL: 'https://res.cloudinary.com//image/fetch', modifiers: { effect: 'sharpen:100', quality: 'auto:best' } } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Flip Modifier DESCRIPTION: Examples of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider and flip modifier in different directions: both horizontal and vertical, horizontal only, and vertical only. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Frame to Images DESCRIPTION: Implementation of frame/border modifications with customizable style, color, and width options SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/sirv.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Installation of Nuxt Image Module using yarn DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @nuxt/image module as a dependency using yarn package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn add @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using truecolor Modifier with TwicPics in Nuxt Image DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use the truecolor modifier to control color quantization in PNG images. Setting truecolor to true prevents color quantization, which preserves image quality at the expense of larger file sizes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Enhancing Image Contrast with ImageKit DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing how to enhance the contrast of an image using ImageKit's effectContrast modifier. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imagekit.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Installation of Nuxt Image Module using bun DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @nuxt/image module as a dependency using bun package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` bun add @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Uploadcare Image Modifiers Type Definitions in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: TypeScript type definitions for the modifiers supported by Uploadcare. Includes options for image compression, geometry adjustments, and other transformations available through Uploadcare's API. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/uploadcare.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` // Image Compression format: 'jpeg' | 'png' | 'webp' | 'auto' quality: 'smart' | 'smart_retina' | 'normal' | 'better' | 'best' | 'lighter' | 'lightest' progressive: 'yes' | 'no' strip_meta: 'all' | 'none' | 'sensitive' // Image Geometry preview: `${number}x${number}` // Height x Width resize: `${number}x${number}` | `${number}x`| `x${number}` smart_resize: `${number}x${number}` crop: string | string[] scale_crop: string | string[] border_radius: string | string[] setfill: string // 3, 6 or 8 digit hex color zoom_objects: string // 1 to 100 ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Sharpening Images with ImageKit DESCRIPTION: Example of applying sharpening effect to an image using ImageKit's effectSharpen modifier with a specified intensity. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/imagekit.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Upgrading Nuxt Image Module using npm DESCRIPTION: Command to upgrade the @nuxt/image module to the latest version using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm up @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Installation of Nuxt Image Module using npm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @nuxt/image module as a dependency using npm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm i @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using NuxtImg with Background for Transparent Images DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg with Twicpics provider to set a red background color for transparent areas in a PNG image. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Upgrading Nuxt Image Module using yarn DESCRIPTION: Command to upgrade the @nuxt/image module to the latest version using yarn package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` yarn upgrade @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Manual Installation of Nuxt Image Module using pnpm DESCRIPTION: Command to install the @nuxt/image module as a dependency using pnpm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm add @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using turn Modifier with TwicPics in Nuxt Image DESCRIPTION: Examples of applying the turn modifier to rotate images with TwicPics. The turn modifier accepts angles in degrees or predefined expressions like 'left', 'right', or 'flip' to change the orientation of images. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/twicpics.md#2025-04-21_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Upgrading Nuxt Image Module using bun DESCRIPTION: Command to upgrade the @nuxt/image module to the latest version using bun package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` bun update @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opting into Edge Channel of Nuxt Image Module DESCRIPTION: Package.json diff showing how to switch from the stable release to the nightly/edge channel of the @nuxt/image module. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` { "devDependencies": { - "@nuxt/image": "^1.0.0" + "@nuxt/image": "npm:@nuxt/image-nightly@latest" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Adding Text Overlay DESCRIPTION: Implementation of text overlays with customizable positioning, styling, and background options SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/sirv.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Recreating Lockfile for Nuxt Project DESCRIPTION: Command to force upgrade a Nuxt project and recreate the lockfile, which can help resolve dependency issues. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx nuxi@latest upgrade --force ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Upgrading Nuxt Image Module using pnpm DESCRIPTION: Command to upgrade the @nuxt/image module to the latest version using pnpm package manager. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm up @nuxt/image ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Default Image Size with Strapi Provider DESCRIPTION: Example of using NuxtImg component with Strapi provider without specifying a breakpoint, which will use the original image size. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/strapi.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Checking Code Style with Linter DESCRIPTION: Command to run the linter to ensure code adheres to the project's style guidelines. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm lint ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Previewing Nuxt 3 Production Build Locally DESCRIPTION: Commands to locally preview the production build of a Nuxt 3 application using different package managers. This allows testing the production build before deployment. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/README.md#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` # npm npm run preview # pnpm pnpm run preview # yarn yarn preview ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Documentation in Development Mode DESCRIPTION: Command to start the documentation site in development mode for making and previewing documentation changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm docs:dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Custom Provider in Vue Template DESCRIPTION: Example of using the custom image provider in a Vue template with the NuxtImg component. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/4.advanced/1.custom-provider.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: vue CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing Cloudimage CDN URL in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: Example of overriding the default CDN URL structure by explicitly setting the cdnURL parameter for Cloudimage provider. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/cloudimage.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: ts CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { cloudimage: { cdnURL: 'https://demo.cloudimg.io/v7' } } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Opting out from Edge Channel of Nuxt Image Module DESCRIPTION: Package.json diff showing how to switch back from the nightly/edge channel to the stable release of the @nuxt/image module. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/1.installation.md#2025-04-21_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: diff CODE: ``` { "devDependencies": { - "@nuxt/image": "npm:@nuxt/image-nightly@latest" + "@nuxt/image": "^1.0.0" } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Filerobot Provider in Nuxt Image Module DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to configure the Filerobot provider in the Nuxt configuration file. You need to specify the base URL of your Filerobot project with your specific slug. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/filerobot.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { filerobot: { baseURL: 'https://.filerobot.com/', }, } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Starting Nuxt Image Playground in Development Mode DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Nuxt Image playground in development mode for testing changes. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm dev ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Image Transformation Parameters Table in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown table listing all supported image transformation parameters for Sirv's Nuxt Image integration, including parameter names, their API equivalents, and descriptions. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/sirv.md#2025-04-21_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` | Supported Parameter Name | Translates to Parameter | Description | | ------------------------ | -------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | width | w | Width of image. | | height | h | Height of image. | | s | s | Resize the image by its biggest side | | quality | q | JPEG image quality (percentage). | | fit | scale.option | Image scaling options. | | profile | profile | Apply a Sirv [profile](https://sirv.com/help/articles/dynamic-imaging/profiles) | | format | format | Image format served (defaults to [optimal](https://sirv.com/help/articles/dynamic-imaging/#optimal)). | | webpFallback | webp-fallback | Image format for browsers without WebP support. | | subsampling | subsampling | Chroma subsampling to reduce JPEG file size. | | gifCompression | gif.lossy | Apply lossy compression, to reduce GIF file size. | ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Building Nuxt Image for Production DESCRIPTION: Command to build the project for production, which should be run before creating a PR to ensure there are no build errors. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm build ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Domain Whitelist in Nuxt with TypeScript DESCRIPTION: Configuration example showing how to whitelist external domains for image processing in Nuxt config file. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/3.providers/aws-amplify.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` export default defineNuxtConfig({ image: { domains: ['avatars0.githubusercontent.com'] } }) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Changelog Entry Format DESCRIPTION: Standard format for documenting version changes in the Nuxt Image module, following conventional commit guidelines with sections for enhancements, fixes, documentation, and other updates. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## v1.10.0 [compare changes](https://github.com/nuxt/image/compare/v1.9.0...v1.10.0) ### Enhancements - **imageengine:** Add new modifiers (#1701) - **filerobot:** Add new provider (#1680) ### Fixes - **NuxtImg:** Do not access `props` in template (e2e61fa) - **NuxtPicture:** Make `img-attrs` and `attrs` responsive (#1696) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Nuxt Image Tests DESCRIPTION: Command to run the test suite to verify changes don't break existing functionality. SOURCE: https://github.com/nuxt/image/blob/main/docs/content/1.get-started/4.contributing.md#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` pnpm test ```
